Package ru.nsu.aeliseev2.task113.parsers

Class Lexer<Data>

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.aeliseev2.task113.parsers.Lexer<Data>
Type Parameters:
Data - The data stored in the tokens.
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, TokenReader<Data>
Direct Known Subclasses:
EvalContextLexer, ExpressionLexer
public abstract class Lexer<Data> extends Object implements TokenReader<Data>
A base class for lexers.
